programme.title: Ha!ifax Comedy Fest

programme.desc: (S14EP11) Rick goes to Inuvik, NWT to join lively festivities at the annual Sunrise Festival marking the sun's return after a month-long absence and then he's off to Toronto's Westpark Heathcare Centre to learn how prosthetics are made and worn..

programme.title: The Rick Mercer Report
programme.desc: (S14EP12) Rick helps test and maintain the ice highway that runs between Inuvik and Tuktoyaktuk, NWT and then he's in Vaughan, ON checking out an indoor freestyle skiing and snowboarding facility.
